short_description: cappello group is a metal fabrication services company based in italy.
long_description: we have been working in the aluminum, hot dip galvanizing and green energy sectors for over 55 years. a path of growth and sustainability entirely made in italy. we are able to be flexible, therefore competitive. we keep most of the processes within our company, from design to distribution. men and women who accompany us in growth because our group has an extremely low turnover. in just 36 square meters, in giarratana, in the province of ragusa, the founder's workshop is born. once posts are published, you'll see them here.
business_tags: aluminum profiles | metal carpentry | surface treatment | metal production | powder coatings | sandblasting | thermal break | shot blasting | respiratory masks | public administration | hot dipped galvanizing | photovoltaic | electrostatic | street light | doors and window | green energy
generated_description: cappello group, legally known as cappello group s.p., is an industrial operator based in italy, specializing in the production of thermal break aluminum profile systems for doors and windows, surface treatments of metals, and the production of photovoltaic modules. the company also engages in hot galvanizing of metal carpentry, thermosetting industrial electrostatic powder coatings, and the production of respiratory masks for medical use. additionally, cappello group s.p.a. manufactures street lighting poles. established in 1965, the company emphasizes quality and innovation, maintaining most processes within its own facilities. the cappello family has managed the company since its inception, focusing on stability and development through a strong emphasis on human capital and continuous training.
